                                        int pLevel)

        Parameters:
        pNickname - represents the player nickname.
        pName - represents the player name.
        pScore - represents the player score.
        pLives - represents the player lives.
        pLevel - represents the player level.
        Returns:
        msj represents the message to show if the player has been successfully added.

      • compareScores

        Parameters:

        pNextLevelScoreRequired - represents the score required to be at a specific level.
        Returns:

      • registerEnemy

        public java.lang.String registerEnemy​(java.lang.String enemyId,
                                      int eType,
                                      java.lang.String eNameType,
                                      int eScoreUp,
                                      int eScoreDown,
                                      int ePositionX,
                                      int ePositionY,
                                      int eLevel)
        registerEnemy checks if there is an empty position to add a new enemy and adds an enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemyId - represents the enemy id.
        eType - represents the enemy type.
        eNameType - represents the enemy name according to the type.
        eScoreUp - represents the score obtained by defeating the enemy.
        eScoreDown - represents the score obtained when defeated by the enemy.
        ePositionX - represents the enemy X position.
        ePositionY - represents the enemy Y position.
        eLevel - represents the enemy level to add.
        Returns:
        msj represents an error message.

        tName - represents the treasure name.

        tScore - represents the treasure score.

        tPositionYList - represents the treasure Y positions.
